content: Great article but you almost lost me at the unneccessary judgemental paragraph about minimalists. Although not a minimalist myself I took some inspiration from their philosophy as I did with many other different and opposing philosophical streams. If it makes them happy why should they lighten up? Just because you don’t feel the same? I could say to you; lighten up and let them be 😉 Anyway, I will listen to your podcast, curious to what you have to say!
